hms.command
Class SearchCommand

java.lang.Object
  hms.command.SearchCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
public class SearchCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command

The Class SearchCommand encapsulates functions for searching check-in/check-out records.
